goal.en: Familiar with Taiwan‘s housing design regulations and design codes through the practice of designing simple reinforced concrete houses.
goal.ch: 經由學習設計簡易鋼筋混凝土房屋，熟悉台灣房屋設計相關法規及設計規範。

content.en:
1. Introduction to the structural system of the building.
2. Introduction to design code static load and live load.
3.Taiwan’s relevant seismic design regulations explanations and practice calculations.
4. Reinforced concrete design code description, design exercises.
5. Introduction to housing design assistant program and practical exercises.
6. Case report of simple reinforced concrete house.
7. 4/15 (Monday) midterm exam (open book, bring computer), 6/17 (Monday) final report.
content.ch:
1.房屋結構系統介紹
2.設計法規靜載重、活載重介紹
3.台灣相關地震設計法規說明、練習計算
4.鋼筋混凝⼟設計規範說明、設計練習
5.房屋設計輔助程式介紹、實際演練
6.簡易鋼筋混凝⼟房屋案例報告
7.4/15（一）期中考試（開書、帶電腦），6/17（一）期末報告

textbook.en: 1. Safe and Earthquake Resistant Home - Recognizing Earthquake Engineering https://www.ncree.org/safehome/pdf/ITEE_All.pdf 2. Seismic Design Specifications and Explanations for Buildings in Taiwan http://www.cpami.gov.tw/最新消息/法規公告/30-建築管理篇/10471-建築物耐震設計規範及解說.html7 3. Design Code for Concrete Structures in Taiwan http:// www.cpami.gov.tw/最新消息/法規公告/30-建築管理篇/10432-結構混凝土施工規範.html
textbook.ch: 1.安全耐震的家-認識地震工程 https://www.ncree.org/safehome/pdf/ITEE_All.pdf 2.台灣建築物耐震設計規範及解說 http://www.cpami.gov.tw/最新消息/法規公告/30-建築管理篇/10471-建築物耐震設計規範及解說.html7 3台灣混凝土結構設計規範 http:// www.cpami.gov.tw/最新消息/法規公告/30-建築管理篇/10432-結構混凝土施工規範.html

grading.en: Course Participation 40％ Classroom exams, practice assignments 10％ Midterm Exam 20％ Final Report 30％
grading.ch: 課程參與 40％ 課堂小考、作業 10％ 期中考試 20％ 期末報告 30％
